name: Facebook Ads
description: The Facebook Ads Connector allows you to access the Facebook Marketing API. This lets you create, update, and delete ad campaigns and ads.

operations.name: dissociateCampaign
operations.description: Dissociate a campaign from an AdAccount.

operations.name: getAdSet
operations.description: Return data related to an ad set.

operations.name: getAdSets
operations.description: Returns all ad sets from one ad account.

operations.name: getAds
operations.description: Returns ads under this ad account.

operations.name: getCampaigns
operations.description: Returns campaigns under this ad account.

operations.name: addUsersToAudience
operations.description: Add users to your custom audience.

operations.name: removeUsersFromAudience
operations.description: Remove users from your custom audience.
